@title Compound's Comet Configuration Interface
 @author Compound

@dev The max number of assets this contract is hardcoded to support
  Do not change this variable without updating all the fields throughout the contract,

@dev The max number of decimals base token can have
  Note this cannot just be increased arbitrarily.
@dev The max value for a collateral factor (1)
@dev Offsets for specific actions in the pause flag bit array
@dev The decimals required for a price feed
@dev 365 days * 24 hours * 60 minutes * 60 seconds
@dev The scale for base tracking accrual
@dev The scale for base index (depends on time/rate scales, not base token)
@dev The scale for prices (in USD)
@dev The scale for factors
@dev The positive present supply balance if positive or the negative borrow balance if negative
@dev The principal amount projected forward by the supply index
@dev The principal amount projected forward by the borrow index
@dev The positive principal if positive or the negative principal if negative

@dev The present value projected backward by the supply index (rounded down)
  Note: This will overflow (revert) at 2^104/1e18=~20 trillion principal for assets with 18 decimals.

@dev The present value projected backward by the borrow index (rounded up)
  Note: This will overflow (revert) at 2^104/1e18=~20 trillion principal for assets with 18 decimals.
@notice Event emitted when a borrow position is absorbed by the protocol
@notice Event emitted when a user's collateral is absorbed by the protocol
@notice Event emitted when a collateral asset is purchased from the protocol
@notice Event emitted when an action is paused/unpaused
@notice Event emitted when reserves are withdrawn by the governor
@dev uint64
@dev uint64
@dev uint64
@dev uint64

@dev Aggregate variables tracked for the entire market
@notice Aggregate variables tracked for each collateral asset
@notice Mapping of users to accounts which may be permitted to manage the user account
@notice The next expected nonce for an address, for validating authorizations via signature
@notice Mapping of users to base principal and other basic data
@notice Mapping of users to collateral data per collateral asset
@notice Mapping of magic liquidator points

MAX_ASSETS.details: The max number of assets this contract is hardcoded to support  Do not change this variable without updating all the fields throughout the contract,

MAX_BASE_DECIMALS.details: The max number of decimals base token can have  Note this cannot just be increased arbitrarily.

MAX_COLLATERAL_FACTOR.details: The max value for a collateral factor (1)
